DOC.brief_summary: The goal study examine effect increase child 's intake fiber unsaturated fat , daily serving hummus vegetable , microbiome profile .
DOC.brief_title: Hummus Health : Dietary Quality Health Outcomes Toddlers
DOC.detailed_description: Population : The investigator recruit 104 child age 12-24 month daycare center Houston surround area . Study design : The study conduct daycare center consist three phase - 'lead period ' ( two week ) baseline measurement take followed 'Introductory period ' ( three week ) new food introduce three day snack time three week . The introductory phase follow 'intervention period ' ( three week ) child receive daily serving hummus vegetable . Lead period ( two week ) : Two 24-hour dietary recall conduct child ( parent-report ) ; one 24-hour dietary recall ( weekend ) conduct parent ( self-report ) . Three dirty diaper collect within time span week microbiome analysis . Introductory period ( three week ) : Since child typically take several introduction new food accept , investigator wish ensure high acceptance hummus , investigator spend three week introduce food . The food provide three day snack time three week . Prior introduce food , child receive 'lesson ' involve information vegetable use combination song , rhyme craft activity . Following lesson , hummus vegetable provide hummus group ; vegetable control group . Hummus provide pre-packaged 2 ounce serve cup ; vegetable conform age-appropriate serving designate American Academy Pediatrics ( AAP ) consist soft vegetable ( e.g. , winter squash ) lightly steam , chill , hard vegetable ( e.g. , carrot , broccoli ) . Intervention period ( three week ) : Similar introductory period , serve either hummus vegetable vegetable provide child snack time . The food provide daily three week . In final week intervention period , two 24-hour dietary recall ( one weekday one weekend ) conduct child ( parent-report ) . In addition , one weekend 24-hour dietary recall conduct parent ( self-report ) . Three dirty diaper collect child final week microbiome analysis .
DOC.criteria: Children age 12 24 month old . Children attend daycare least 3 day week . Children parentalreport hummusnaive . Any child follow specific dietary regimen religious restriction food allergy may affect food consumption . Children parentreported antibiotic use previous 6 month .
